title: Honey Garlic Glazed Chicken Thighs
description: Crispy-skinned chicken thighs with a sweet and savory honey garlic glaze that caramelizes beautifully in the oven.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425Â°F and season chicken thighs generously with salt and pepper on both sides.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Sear chicken thighs skin-side down for 6-7 minutes until golden brown and crispy, then flip and cook for 2-3 minutes more.
Meanwhile, whisk together honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, grated ginger, and red pepper flakes in a bowl.
Remove chicken thighs temporarily from the pan and pour off excess fat, leaving about 1 tablespoon in the pan.
Return chicken thighs to the pan and pour half of the honey garlic glaze over the chicken.
Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, basting with the remaining glaze halfway through cooking.
For extra caramelization, broil for 2-3 minutes at the end, watching carefully to prevent burning.
Remove from oven and garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds before serving.
